frontend.airbnbmapview module¶

class frontend.airbnbmapview.AirbnbMapView(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: kivy_garden.mapview.view.MapView

This Class holds and displays the Map

firstCall = True¶
get_airbnb_in_fov(*args)¶

query api for listings in fov. Fov defined by 4 corners of screen. places Clustermarkers & Markers wherever there is a matching listing in our database.

listing_id_list = []¶
selected_id = -1¶

frontend.listingDetail module¶

class frontend.listingDetail.RoundedCornerLayout¶

Bases: kivymd.uix.boxlayout.MDBoxLayout

Customised layout for rounded corners on listing-popup when clicking on marker

orientation = 'vertical'¶
frontend.listingDetail.listing_detail(listing_id, parent)¶

Fetches listing details when clicking on marker on map. First makes API get request then continues to arrange data in widgets which is added to the Mapview Screen as popup.

Parameters

  • listing_id (int)

  • parent (widget)

Returns

popup

Return type

widget

frontend.listingDetail.open_link(url)¶

opens the url in browser

Parameters

url (str) – The url defined in the listing, clicked on by user
